caption.p: Alignment of the cryo-EM structure of Drs2p and a 3D structural model of PcATP2. The 3D structural model of PcATP2 (cartoon representation) was aligned with the cryo-EM structure of the autoinhibited conformation of Drs2p (PDB ID 6roh, mesh representation [ 23]). Protein domains of PcATP2 in the cytoplasmic region between TMs 2 and 3 that are absent in Drs2p are depicted in blue. Protein domains of PcATP2 in the cytoplasmic region between TMs 4 and 5 that are absent in Drs2p are depicted in magenta. ( A) Lateral perspective of the molecule. ( B) Cytoplasmic view after 90Â° rotation of A through the x axis. The grey shadow square in A represents the putative position of the surrounding membrane.
